title: Atizon Elegant Ruched Bodycon Evening Dresses for Women Cocktail Party Formal Maxi Mermaid Dress
description: Get ready to wow: Create a chic impression in this long sleeve bodycon cocktail dress. So modest, sophisticated & Classy! Designed with great material with plenty of stretch, the ruched seams will accentuate your stunning curves on the bodycon silhouette.

Suitable: Style with heels for all the compliments. Prefect for spring, winter, fall.
